name: @manifold/api
description: Backend API endpoints for the Manifold website.

scripts.watch:serve: nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch lib --watch ../../common/src --watch ../shared/src --exec 'yarn compile && node lib/serve.js'
scripts.dev: nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src -e ts --watch ../../common/src -e ts --watch ../shared/src -e ts --exec "yarn compile && node lib/serve.js"
scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn dist:prepare && yarn dist:copy
scripts.debug: nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src -e ts --watch ../../common/src --watch ../shared/src --exec "yarn build:fast && node --inspect-brk lib/serve.js"
scripts.dist:prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/common/lib dist/backend/shared/lib dist/backend/api/lib
scripts.dist:copy: rsync -a --delete ../../common/lib/ dist/common/lib && rsync -a --delete ../shared/lib/ dist/backend/shared/lib && rsync -a --delete ./lib/ dist/backend/api/lib && cp ../../yarn.lock dist && cp package.json dist
